jobDescription: Experienced Parts Counter Specialist-Germain Honda of Ann ArborGermain Honda of Ann Arbor is seeking an experienced full-time Experienced Parts Counter Specialist. Responsibilities include both retail and counter parts sales. Applicants who are professional, organized, detail oriented, who demonstrate strong communication skills and have a mechanical knowledge of vehicles must apply! 40 hours per week Monday through Friday with availability on Saturday.Commission based pay. At Germain, our mission is to attract, develop and retain exceptional people to deliver an outstanding experience that creates loyalty beyond reason, one customer at a time.  For immediate consideration apply at GermainCareers.com.MP Back  Email  Apply Now
